Home.title: UFO
descriptions: Aliens will cooperate with your server
Don't show this to Ren TV

features.name: Economy
features.description: Members can earn money and spend them in the shop. Who will become the most rich and experienced?

features.name: Games
features.description: In casino games you can have fun and bet your economy money. Please do not scream if you lose all your money!

features.name: Utilities
features.description: Bot contains several useful utilities that can help you in server management and communication

features.name: Logs
features.description: Bot can log messages deletions and edits and all server moderation actions

features.name: Moderation
features.description: Punish malicious violators of your server rules with warns, mutes, kicks and bans

features.name: Automoderation
features.description: And for some violations, the bot can punish members automatically!

features.name: Greetings
features.description: UFO will gladly greet new server members in channel and in DMs and give them roles

features.name: Settings
features.description: The bot has a convenient and intuitive control panel where you can customize the most of the features

Donate.title: Donate
Donate.name: Donate
Donate.description:
Support us to get UFO Boosts! You can activate them on servers with command boost
Activating the boost on the server opens bonus features on it:

features.name: Money for messages
features.description: Set amount of money that will be given to members for messages with certain chance

features.name: Punishments DM messages
features.description: Set message with template variables that will be sent to kicked/banned members id DM

features.name: Money bonuses
features.description: Set daily and weekly bonuses on the server

features.name: Increased limits
features.description: Limit of items in the shop - 40 (instead of 15), giveaways - 25 (instead of 10), coupons - 25 (instead of 10)

standard.name: Standard
perks: [R]on support server with permission to change nickname

premium.name: Premium
perks: [R]role on support server with permission to view audit log
